name: AMU
description:
Due to the recent demand, AMU is on SALE for a limited time! Get AMU for 50% off the original sales price! Now priced at $0.99 USD!

AMU is the world's first mobile game that not only takes place on your screen, but also takes place in the world around you. An entertaining test of agility, coordination and spatial awareness, AMU uses a sophisticatedly simple and graphic design interface to open dynamic, demanding game play to you and your surroundings. For the best experience, play AMU with your headphones!

Joe Doucet Studio envisions, develops and launches intriguing intellectual property and compelling brand concepts with elevated design and innovation at their core. Always partnering with the best people and brands from around the world, AMU was brought to life in association with Sirqul API’s.

For more information about Joe Doucet, visit http://joedoucet.com

For more information about Sirqul, visit http://sirqul.com

Important: AMU is only compatible with Gyroscope-enabled iOS devices:
- iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5
- iPad 2, Retina Display iPad (3rd gen), Retina Display iPad (4th gen w/ lightning connector)
- iPod Touch 4th generation, iPod Touch 5th generation
